item.description:
Update:  Something has come up for May 12, so I'm going to have to move this to the next popular date of Tuesday, May 10.  

Austrian wines was also the leading contendor for theme (by a slim margin).  Turns out that Austria is home to its very own indigenous grape--Gruner Veltliner.  AND, you can actually find Austrian wines here in MA!

So, dust off your "Sound of Music" knowledge, practice your rendition of "Edelweiss" and join us for a foray into the world of Austrian wines.

Gladly seeking volunteers to provide appetizers.  And if you're dying to host a wine tasting--let me know!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: The Hills are Alive with swigs of Wine! (Austrian Wines that is)
